summary: The client requested Sarah to start the sprint execution, which was initiated for sprint SP-001 by the SPRINT_EXECUTION_PM, assigning roles to Mike for story breakdown, Alex for coding, and Jordan for testing, with the AI team beginning work.

decisions.title: Initiate Sprint Execution
decisions.details: Sprint SP-001 execution started with assigned team roles: Mike to break down stories, Alex to code, and Jordan to test.
